price: 52. au jour où plus aucune de leurs excuses ne servira aux injustes, qui auront (pour partage) la malédiction et la pire des demeures.
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu al-ẓālimīna maʿdhiratuhum walahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
